page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT STRUCTURE: AMBLE
page.content: In{May 1985 Amble's population}is {5,360.}This represents{a steady growth over the{past 20 years}as people have {migrated from surrounding pit villages where{mining has ceased. The employment structure of Amble is as follows: Agriculture (incl. fishing) {5% Energy & Water (incl. mining){19% Manufacturing { 9% Construction {15% Distribution and Catering {20% Transport {4% Other services {28% {21%}of the employed people{travel outside the Amble area to their place of work Unfortunately Amble has a{high un- {employment figure of 17% -}which reflects the{decline in mining}and the {general economic situation.}Positive {steps are being taken to remedy this.
